verses.verse: What <S%G5101><s%> advantage <S%G4053><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> hath the <S%G3588><s%> Jew? <S%G2453><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> profit <S%G5622><s%> is there of circumcision? <S%G4061><s%>

Much <S%G4183><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> way: <S%G5158><s%> chiefly, <S%G4412><s%> <S%G3303><s%> because <S%G1063><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> unto them were committed <S%G4100><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> oracles <S%G3051><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> did not believe? <S%G569><s%> shall their <S%G848><s%> unbelief <S%G570><s%> <S%G3361><s%> make the faith of God without effect? <S%G2673><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> <S%G2316><s%>

God forbid: <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361><s%> yea, let God <S%G2316><s%> be <S%G1096><s%> true, <S%G227><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> man <S%G444><s%> a liar; <S%G5583><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> thou mightest be justified <S%G1344><s%> <S%G302><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sayings, <S%G3056><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> mightest overcome <S%G3528><s%> when thou <S%G4571><s%> art judged. <S%G2919><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> our <S%G2257><s%> unrighteousness <S%G93><s%> commend <S%G4921><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall we say? <S%G2046><s%> Is God <S%G2316><s%> unrighteous <S%G94><s%> who taketh <S%G2018><s%> vengeance? I <S%G3709><s%> (speak <S%G3004><s%> as <S%G2596><s%> a man) <S%G444><s%>
God forbid: <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361><s%> for then <S%G1893><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall God <S%G2316><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world? <S%G2889><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> hath more abounded <S%G4052><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> lie <S%G5582><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> his <S%G848><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> yet <S%G2089><s%> am I also <S%G2504><s%> judged <S%G2919><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> a sinner? <S%G268><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> rather, (as <S%G2531><s%> we be slanderously reported, <S%G987><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> as <S%G2531><s%> some <S%G5100><s%> affirm <S%G5346><s%> that we <S%G2248><s%> say,) Let us <S%G3004><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> good <S%G18><s%> may come? <S%G2064><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> damnation <S%G2917><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> just. <S%G1738><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> are we better <S%G4284><s%> than they? No, <S%G3756><s%> in no wise: <S%G3843><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> we have before proved <S%G4256><s%> both <S%G5037><s%> Jews <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> Gentiles, <S%G1672><s%> that they are <S%G1511><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> under <S%G5259><s%> sin; <S%G266><s%>
As <S%G2531><s%> it is written, <S%G1125><s%> There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> righteous, <S%G1342><s%> no, not <S%G3761><s%> one: <S%G1520><s%>
There is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that understandeth, <S%G4920><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that seeketh after <S%G1567><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

They are all <S%G3956><s%> gone out of the way, <S%G1578><s%> they are together <S%G260><s%> become unprofitable; <S%G889><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> none <S%G3756><s%> that doeth <S%G4160><s%> good, <S%G5544><s%> no, <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2193><s%> one. <S%G1520><s%>

Their <S%G848><s%> throat <S%G2995><s%> is an open <S%G455><s%> sepulcher; <S%G5028><s%> with their <S%G848><s%> tongues <S%G1100><s%> they have used deceit; <S%G1387><s%> the poison <S%G2447><s%> of asps <S%G785><s%> is under <S%G5259><s%> their <S%G848><s%> lips: <S%G5491><s%>
Whose <S%G3739><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> is full <S%G1073><s%> of cursing <S%G685><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> bitterness: <S%G4088><s%>
Their <S%G848><s%> feet <S%G4228><s%> are swift <S%G3691><s%> to shed <S%G1632><s%> blood: <S%G129><s%>
Destruction <S%G4938><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> misery <S%G5004><s%> are in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G848><s%> ways: <S%G3598><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> the way <S%G3598><s%> of peace <S%G1515><s%> have they not <S%G3756><s%> known: <S%G1097><s%>
There is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> before <S%G561><s%> their <S%G848><s%> eyes. <S%G3788><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> we know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> what things soever <S%G3745><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> saith, <S%G3004><s%> it saith <S%G2980><s%> to them <S%G3588><s%> who are under <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law: <S%G3551><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> may be stopped, <S%G5420><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> may become <S%G1096><s%> guilty <S%G5267><s%> before God. <S%G2316><s%>

Therefore <S%G1360><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> there shall no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> be justified <S%G1344><s%> in his sight: <S%G1799><s%> <S%G846><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is the knowledge <S%G1922><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3570><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> is manifested, <S%G5319><s%> being witnessed <S%G3140><s%> by <S%G5259><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> prophets; <S%G4396><s%>

Even <S%G1161><s%> the righteousness <S%G1343><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> which is by <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> upon <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> them that believe: <S%G4100><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> difference: <S%G1293><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> have sinned, <S%G264><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> come short <S%G5302><s%> of the <S%G3588><s%> glory <S%G1391><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

Being justified <S%G1344><s%> freely <S%G1432><s%> by his <S%G848><s%> grace <S%G5485><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> redemption <S%G629><s%> that <S%G3588><s%> is in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus: <S%G2424><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> hath set forth <S%G4388><s%> to be a propitiation <S%G2435><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G848><s%> blood, <S%G129><s%> to declare <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1732><s%> his <S%G848><s%> righteousness <S%G1343><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> remission <S%G3929><s%> of sins <S%G265><s%> that are past, <S%G4266><s%> through <S%G1722><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> forbearance <S%G463><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>

To <S%G4314><s%> declare, <S%G1732><s%> I say, at <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> his <S%G846><s%> righteousness: <S%G1343><s%> that he <S%G846><s%> might be <S%G1511><s%> just, <S%G1342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the justifier <S%G1344><s%> of him <S%G3588><s%> which believeth <S%G1537><s%> <S%G4102><s%> in Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Where <S%G4226><s%> is boasting <S%G2746><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%> It is excluded. <S%G1576><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> what <S%G4169><s%> law? <S%G3551><s%> of works? <S%G2041><s%> Nay: <S%G3780><s%> but <S%G235><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of faith. <S%G4102><s%>
Therefore <S%G3767><s%> we conclude <S%G3049><s%> that a man <S%G444><s%> is justified <S%G1344><s%> by faith <S%G4102><s%> without <S%G5565><s%> the deeds <S%G2041><s%> of the law. <S%G3551><s%>

Is he <S%G2228><s%> the <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> of the Jews <S%G2453><s%> only? <S%G3440><s%> is he <S%G1161><s%> not <S%G3780><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> of the Gentiles? <S%G1484><s%> Yes, <S%G3483><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> also: <S%G2532><s%>

Seeing <S%G1897><s%> it is one <S%G1520><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> shall justify <S%G1344><s%> the circumcision <S%G4061><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith. <S%G4102><s%>

Do we then <S%G3767><s%> make void <S%G2673><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> faith? <S%G4102><s%> God forbid: <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3361><s%> yea, <S%G235><s%> we establish <S%G2476><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>
